revision.text: '''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]].

'''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-39804510|title=Trump shadow hangs over climate talks opening|work=''The Guardian''|date=8 May 2017|publisher=BBC}}</ref>

'''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-39804510|title=Trump shadow hangs over climate talks opening|date=8 May 2017|publisher=BBC}}</ref>

'''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]]. He is also the chairman of the [[Alliance of Small Island States]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-39804510|title=Trump shadow hangs over climate talks opening|date=8 May 2017|publisher=BBC}}</ref>

'''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]]. He is also the chairman of the [[Alliance of Small Island States]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-39804510|title=Trump shadow hangs over climate talks opening|date=8 May 2017|publisher=BBC}}</ref> Ibrahim has been outwardly critical of US President [[Donald Trump|Donald Trump's]] 2017 decision to withdraw America from the [[Paris agreement|Paris agreement to combat climate change]].<ref>{{cite news|title=Paris Agreement is not ‘renegotiable’|url=http://aosis.org/paris-agreement-is-not-renegotiable/|accessdate=2 June 2017|publisher=AOSIS|date=1 June 2017}}</ref>

'''Thoriq Ibrahim''' is the current Minister of Environment and Energy for the [[Maldives]]. He is also the chairman of the [[Alliance of Small Island States]].<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-39804510|title=Trump shadow hangs over climate talks opening|date=8 May 2017|publisher=BBC}}</ref> Ibrahim has been outwardly critical of US President [[Donald Trump|Donald Trump's]] 2017 decision to withdraw America from the [[Paris Agreement|Paris agreement to combat climate change]].<ref>{{cite news|title=Paris Agreement is not ‘renegotiable’|url=http://aosis.org/paris-agreement-is-not-renegotiable/|accessdate=2 June 2017|publisher=AOSIS|date=1 June 2017}}</ref>
